message:
https://perchance.org/ai-character-chat?data=Okita_Souji~a7d29f94c2241e58e9cbbe7063d81a55.gz
Tried explicitly banning words in the writing instructions and character reminder (seems to reduce the frequency a fair bit?) Also, making it focus on dialogue and give only basic and minimal descriptions definitely helps it not waffle and say stupid shit.
